connect_conv_size.default: >= MariaDB 10.4.8, MariaDB 10.3.18, MariaDB 10.2.27: 1024, <= MariaDB 10.4.7, MariaDB 10.3.17, MariaDB 10.2.26: 8192
connect_conv_size.name: connect_conv_size

wsrep_max_ws_rows.default: 0 (>= MariaDB Galera 10.0.27, MariaDB 10.1.17), 131072 (<= MariaDB Galera 10.0.26, MariaDB 10.1.16)
wsrep_max_ws_rows.name: wsrep_max_ws_rows

wsrep_max_ws_size.default: 2147483647 (2GB, >= MariaDB Galera 10.0.27, MariaDB 10.1.17), 1073741824 (1GB, <= MariaDB Galera 10.0.26, MariaDB 10.1.16)
wsrep_max_ws_size.name: wsrep_max_ws_size

wsrep_node_address.default: Primary network address, usually eth0 with a default port of 4567, or 0.0.0.0 if no IP address.
wsrep_node_address.name: wsrep_node_address

wsrep_on.default: OFF (>= MariaDB 10.1), ON (<= MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0),
wsrep_on.name: wsrep_on

log_slow_filter.default: admin, filesort, filesort_on_disk, full_join, full_scan, query_cache, query_cache_miss, tmp_table, tmp_table_on_disk (<= MariaDB 10.3.0), admin, filesort, filesort_on_disk, filesort_priority_queue, full_join, full_scan, query_cache, query_cache_miss, tmp_table, tmp_table_on_disk (>= MariaDB 10.3.1)
log_slow_filter.name: log_slow_filter

plugin_maturity.default: One less than the server maturity (>= MariaDB 10.3.3), unknown (<= MariaDB 10.3.2)
plugin_maturity.name: plugin_maturity

query_cache_size.default: 1M (>= MariaDB 10.1.7), 0 (<= MariaDB 10.1.6) (although frequently given a default value in some setups)
query_cache_size.name: query_cache_size

sql_mode.default: ONLY_FULL_GROUP_BY STRICT_TRANS_TABLES NO_ZERO_IN_DATE NO_ZERO_DATE ERROR_FOR_DIVISION_BY_ZERO NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION
sql_mode.name: sql_mode

tokudb_cache_size.default: Half of the total system memory
tokudb_cache_size.name: tokudb_cache_size

innodb_compression_algorithm.default: zlib (>= MariaDB 10.2.4, MariaDB 10.1.22), none (<= MariaDB 10.2.3, MariaDB 10.1.21)
innodb_compression_algorithm.name: innodb_compression_algorithm

innodb_empty_free_list_algorithm.default: deprecated (>= MariaDB 10.2.6), legacy (>= MariaDB 10.1.24), backoff (<= MariaDB 10.1.23)
innodb_empty_free_list_algorithm.name: innodb_empty_free_list_algorithm

innodb_ibuf_max_size.default: 1/2 the size of the InnoDB buffer pool
innodb_ibuf_max_size.name: innodb_ibuf_max_size

dragnet.log_error_filter_rules.default: IF prio>=INFORMATION THEN drop. IF EXISTS source_line THEN unset source_line.
dragnet.log_error_filter_rules.name: dragnet.log_error_filter_rules

log_syslog.default: ON (when error logging to system log is enabled)
log_syslog.name: log_syslog

partial_revokes.default: OFF (if partial revokes do not exist)ON (if partial revokes exist)
partial_revokes.name: partial_revokes
